line.token: * This file is part of the Symfony package.
* For the full copyright and license information, please view the LICENSE
* file that was distributed with this source code.
* SqliteProfilerStorage stores profiling information in a SQLite database.
* @throws \RuntimeException When neither of SQLite3 or PDO_SQLite extension is enabled
'Please check your configuration. You are trying to use Sqlite with an invalid dsn "%s". The expected format is "sqlite:/path/to/the/db/file".'
'You need to enable either the SQLite3 or PDO_SQLite extension for the profiler to run properly.'
'CREATE TABLE IF NOT EXISTS sf_profiler_data (token STRING, data STRING, ip STRING, method STRING, url STRING, time INTEGER, parent STRING, created_at INTEGER, status_code INTEGER)'
'CREATE INDEX IF NOT EXISTS data_created_at ON sf_profiler_data (created_at)'
'CREATE INDEX IF NOT EXISTS data_ip ON sf_profiler_data (ip)'
'CREATE INDEX IF NOT EXISTS data_method ON sf_profiler_data (method)'
'CREATE INDEX IF NOT EXISTS data_url ON sf_profiler_data (url)'
'CREATE INDEX IF NOT EXISTS data_parent ON sf_profiler_data (parent)'
'CREATE UNIQUE INDEX IF NOT EXISTS data_token ON sf_profiler_data (token)'
